title: Lentil Barley and Mushroom Soup
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 stick celery, chopped', '2 carrots, chopped', '150g pearl barley', '150g brown lentils', '30g dried porcini mushrooms, rinsed', '2 litres low salt beef stock', '1/4 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 bay leaf', '275g button mushrooms, sliced', '1 tablespoon dry sherry']
